price: 92. Kasi ekoki kosalama te ete: Ar-Rahmân azala na mwana.
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
